meta.title: Luna Trapped in Cartoon Invisible Box

beats.visual: Spotlight snaps on; Luna pats the air, hits unseen wall.
beats.gag_note: Sound effect of gentle glass ping.

beats.visual: Luna traces box outline; sparkles mark imaginary edges.
Invisible elevator lever lowers Luna dramatically.
Luna pulls invisible rope; imaginary anvil hovers overhead.
Invisible door opens; Luna smacks into side panel.
Luna climbs invisible ladder, floating higher with each paw.
Box suddenly shrinks; Luna's whiskers squish comically.
Invisible confetti rains as Luna escapes with flourish.
Luna runs into new wall, shrugs to camera.

tts_line: Luna keeps finding walls that only exist in mime-land.
style_prompt: cartoon sleek gray cat, curious wide eyes, clean bold outlines, flat colors, soft rim light, dynamic angle, vertical 9:16, spotlit stage with invisible box mimed by cartoon cat, fast cuts, vertical 9:16
